scripts.build:sqlite-otel: echo 'Starting build...' && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/sqlite-otel/docs && echo 'Copying landing page...' && cp index.html dist/ && echo 'Copying static site from site/ to /sqlite-otel/...' && cp -r sqlite-otel/site/* dist/sqlite-otel/ && echo 'Copying MkDocs to /sqlite-otel/docs/...' && cp -r sqlite-otel/site/* dist/sqlite-otel/docs/ && echo 'Build complete'
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx serve dist
